title: ’Kingmaker’ Explores Marcos Family Return to Power
itunes:title: ’Kingmaker’ Explores Marcos Family Return to Power
description:
Lauren Greenfield, Director of the film “The Kingmaker”, discusses the documentary about former First Lady of the Philippines Imelda Marcos and her family’s improbable return to power in the Philippines.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
